author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make sure that change of units in dd4hep will not affect GEM/ME0 geometry

#### PR validation:

Tested using cfg files in Geometry/GEMGeometryBuilder/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gem57 Make sure that change of units in dd4hep will not affect GEM/ME0 geometry
